doc.headline: Syrian Rebels are Al Qaeda
doc.post:
Picked this gem from the MSM. interesting, eh?
http://www.freep.com/article/2013061...ty-to-al-Qaeda
Apparently Obammy wants to send arms to the rebels. I'm sure they wont be used against us, just like in Afghanistan.

Syrian Rebels are Al Qaeda
You just stated the obvious. Anyone who is paying attention knows that.

Like the White House and CIAs best buddy, Mujahadeen leader Usama Bin Laden, Al-Q is taking black money and doing dirty work in Nation destroying, that our legitimate goverment can't do openly.
The USA sponsors terrorists around the Globe, Libya, Afghanistan, Syria, Venezeula ect. When would be a good time to explain this to the sheeople, so they understand?
That's why Obama is sending them Arms. Plain and Simple. Obama is Al Qaeda too, incase you have'nt noticed.

Syrian Rebels are Al Qaeda
You just stated the obvious. Anyone who is paying attention knows that.
Some are, some aren't. Last week rebels were fighting other rebels. Completely effed up situation. We need to stay completely out of it. Let them kiill each other and leave it to God to sort them out.

Some are, some aren't. Last week rebels were fighting other rebels. Completely effed up situation. We need to stay completely out of it. Let them kiill each other and leave it to God to sort them out.
Yeah good theory, but they targeted civilians in Boston, not fellow Muzzies in the WH. So it's not working. Arm everyone and let God and the Devil have their war!

Yeah good theory, but they targeted civilians in Boston, not fellow Muzzies in the WH.
Those were Chechens, not Syrians.
I'm close to agreeing with that.

Those were Chechens, not Syrians.
I'm close to agreeing with that.
I said they were Muzzies not Syians. After all are the Al-Q in Syria, Syrians? Not all of them, but they are Muzzies, and the OP was asking for a Muzzie vs. Muzzie murderfest.

We should be helping Assad get his country back as he is the best chance at maintaining stability in that country. We screwed up Iraq,Egypt and Libya so why we think Syria would turn out better is beyond me. Its like that definition of insanity is doing the same thing over and over and expecting a different result...Arm Assad and he will take care of the local Al Q population for us. At one time that is what we wanted.

Yeah good theory, but they targeted civilians in Boston, not fellow Muzzies in the WH. So it's not working. Arm everyone and let God and the Devil have their war!
Your last sentence is frightening, in a way. To engage in a global theocratic war would be fulfilling the darker regions of prophecy. Matt. 24:6, for instance.

Your last sentence is frightening, in a way. To engage in a global theocratic war would be fulfilling the darker regions of prophecy. Matt. 24:6, for instance.
This is where we are headed.
